title: New: Chelsea Burgin – Bill
content:
I’m fairly sure that Chelsea Burgin is my soulmate.

I don’t think she knows it yet, but I’m pretty sure I’m right. With her cutesy good looks and splendid voice, the term ‘perfect woman’ may seem like a drastic overstatement, but trust me on this one. New demo Bill is a spider-web fragile gem, recorded on an iPhone so forgive the audio quality, yet the talent is all too clear. Yearning and romanticized, Bill appears to be a figment of Chelsea’s imagination, buried deep in her subconscious. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
